body:
We have sent you a confirmation email.

### What happens next

We've sent your application to the Court of Protection.

They will contact you by email once they've checked it.

There may be a delay in processing your application because of the coronavirus outbreak.

### Tell us about your experience of serving and notifying people

We’d like to know about your experience of serving and notifying people when applying to the Court of Protection for a property and affairs deputyship.

It should take no longer than 10 minutes to [complete this survey](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/RBHP6YK). We’ll use your feedback to help improve the process.
heading: Application sent
